description:
In this course we will design make and measure a common part using GD&T

In less than one hour you will have a basic understanding of how GD&T works, you will know what to look for in a drawing and know the types of things you can achieve with this process.

If you are aware of GD&T but have no idea how to read it, then this course is for you.

Easy to understand language with simple examples to develop each new point take all the stress out of learning the topic.

This is lesson one, it is designed to ease you into the subject, you can take your time and decide if you want more.
title: Beginners Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing (GD&T) .
instructors: Steve Hartshorn, M.Ed., D.A., Ben Hartshorn, B.Sc., Comp. Sci.
